Name: Circus Pocus
About the game: Walking through the dark forest, two brothers accidentally fall into the territory of an abandoned circus. After a sudden attack by crazed clowns, one of the brothers is captured. What's left for the second brother but to run away from the fucking forest and call the police? That's right — our hero is not too smart, so he goes to save his brother alone, deep into the mysterious forest, where not only danger awaits, but also imminent coulrophobia. Circus Pocus is an action adventure with a top view in which we will solve puzzles, hide from enemies, and also fight off the local inhabitants of a strange institution with a baton. The task of the game is to explore an abandoned circus and find a passage to the next level, which will be more difficult than the previous ones, as well as full of new enemies and bosses. The hero has a number of skills: Somersault – you can use it to overcome the stakes on the floor Whistling is a clever maneuver to distract enemies Blow - the ability to hold a weapon in your hands, with which you can fight off crowds of enemies.ution with a baton.
